mods.abstract: The recording is of Little Hank and the Rhythm Kings (musicial group), and Johnny Jones and the Imperial Seven (musicial group). The recording features Hardison performing takes of the tunes "Chirstene," "The House of Pink Lights," "Really (Part 1)," and "Really (Part 2)." The recordings are from unidentified dates.
